column2: "Lisa has good news. You've killed oodles of enemies! Not just one oodle, but oodles of oodles!"
"Since you've come this far, why not become an even stronger Gunner? Lisa knows you want to, and Lisa can make it happen!"
"We have to follow procedure, though. Bring Lisa more proofs of your overwhelming destruction of enemies!"
"That is to say, please bring Lisa 2 Gu Excubes, okay?!"
